participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined and resilient, always striving to reach her goals despite challenges.
participant_1.background: I love playing softball. My father is in the army. I recently was fired and had to get a new job. My mom passed away when I was young. I work in the insurance business.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and stylish, with a keen interest in luxury items and a desire for independence.
participant_2.background: My dream car is a Rolls Royce Ghost. I like shopping. My family doesn't support my career choices. I currently work for a watch dealer.

content.text: Important to start somthing to achieve goal whenever family is not supported
My goal is to become an mechanical engineer
What kind of food do you serve?
I work for a company that sells insurance.
What do you do for work?
